mapper.select: select p.id, v.NAME,p.PROJECTNAME,p.LOCATION,p.MONEY,p.RATEMONEY,t.USERNAME,i.MONEY ,i.TIME from invest i,projectapplication p,investor v,usertable t where i.subjectid=p.id and i.investorid = v.id and p.userid=t.userID

select p.id, v.NAME,p.PROJECTNAME,p.LOCATION,p.MONEY,p.RATEMONEY,t.USERNAME,i.MONEY ,i.TIME from invest i,projectapplication p,investor v,usertable t where i.subjectid=p.id and i.investorid = v.id and p.userid=t.userID and v.NAME like #{name}

select p.id, v.NAME,p.PROJECTNAME,p.LOCATION,p.MONEY,p.RATEMONEY,t.USERNAME,i.MONEY ,i.TIME from invest i,projectapplication p,investor v,usertable t where i.subjectid=p.id and i.investorid = v.id and p.userid=t.userID and i.TIME >#{0} and i.TIME < #{1}

select p.id, v.NAME,p.PROJECTNAME,p.LOCATION,p.MONEY,p.RATEMONEY,t.USERNAME,i.MONEY ,i.TIME from invest i,projectapplication p,investor v,usertable t where i.subjectid=p.id and i.investorid = v.id and p.userid=t.userID and i.TIME >#{0} and i.TIME < #{1} and v.NAME like #{2}
